project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to load and read the CSV file
Implement functionality to calculate the mean for the specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the median for the specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mode for the specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they function correctly
